item.title: Boot Fedora From Windows Hyper-V
item.description:
1. Enable Hypyer-V
  2. disk manager -> offline
  3. create vm. skip the disk creation
  4. open vm settings. select physical disk instead of vhd
  5. Disable secure boot and checkpoint
